title: geometric sans from tillwiedeck.com
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HelloMe_MakingPublic_03_4211.jpg)
  
Can you please help me to id this sans? It's not brown, not underground pro. I like it a lot.  
(by the way, how can i put a thumbnail in my post to be seen in the list?)

Font: 

 Supergrotesk 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110219/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: slokai

comments.content: It could be **[Super Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110219/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontShop&ffam=SuperGroteskA%20MedLF%20-%20Regular&fid=fcb11f907ebb1372ef84f4263944ad93&fsize=60&text=FRIEBERG&wrap=2)** by Svend Smital (1999, FontFont)
Click on your Name, then on your "My Profile" page, select Edit. Scroll down to the picture section where you will be able to upload an avatar.

Fvilanakis.  
perfect match Thank you very much!

George.  
I meant the thumbnail in the id list, not the avatar. I searched everywhere but I couldn't find how to add a thumbnail in the post. Thanks anyway!
Just below the lower left corner of the reply box, there is an "Insert image" link. Click that then choose the image file you want.
